document.full_text: ibm has agreed to pay $10 million to settle a complaint its employees tried to bribe south korean and chinese officials with cash, gifts and entertainment in return for business for more than a decade.
document.title: ibm pays $10 million to settle bribery complaint
lines_and_colors: ibm has agreed to pay $10 million to settle a complaint its employees tried to bribe south korean and chinese officials with cash, gifts and entertainment in return for business for more than a decade.
